response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value for us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this exceptional product to you for $1,200,000. We understand that such an investment might require careful consideration, and we are confident that once you experience its benefits, you will find the price to be well worth it. Should you have any questions or need further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 1200000}
